Comments
A small campus with a great security staff helps students to feel safe walking anywhere on campus.
Besides all of the Sport Activies, We also haveDrama, Student Government you name it we have it.
Great for students looking for a more personalized college experience. You won't get lost in the crowd at Campbellsville.
The local movie theater has free movie night and reduce prices for students. The local bowling alley offers the same.
Cafe offers great choices as well as the Tiger Grill, but we also have a Chick-fil-A, Starbucks and Papa John's on campus. There is also Books N Beans if you are looking just to snack.
Great oppurtunity to meet and make friends. From apartment style to the traditional dorm rooms make it easy.
Small class size makws it possible for your professor to know you name and give one on one teaching when needed. Several Majors to chose from.
Attend LINK for prospective students. It gives you an idea about campus life and courses.

Classes are small enough that you get one on one teaching when needed. A campus that put Christ first and teaches you to apply it in the real world. An abundance of activities that help you to meet and interact with people from around the world.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students -If you plan on skipping class for no reason, the attendance policy will make your life miserable. -Academics is rated very high for this school. So plan on working hard in the majority of your classes. Bang for the buck Campbellsville, has recently become quite expensive. So if you haven't applied for any scholarships, do so. The Internet has many options available to you. Am enjoying being here I enjoy going to my education major classes. Some of the professors, and students tend to be snobby and put off. Am learning a lot When a person is taking courses in their intended major, they will definitely learn lots. However, in the gen ed courses, it will all depend on the professor if the student will gain the knowledge intended.
